description:
More warmth, stretch, and wind-blocking capabilities are packed into this sleek balaclava design, making it the ideal choice for cold-weather adventures.

  • Crafted with Seirus' exclusive Dynamax fabric for warmth and moisture-wicking
  • Engineered with hinged construction for an exceptional fit
  • Impressive warmth while maintaining a sleek, thin profile
name: Seirus Dynamax Hinged Headliner Balaclava - Unisex

value: Fabrics vary; see product descriptionFabrics vary; see product description
